Topic: Draw a habitat and the different living things in each
Level Description: Advanced (complete and accurate representation of all elements)
CAN: The student can create detailed and accurate illustrations of both land habitats (like a playground, garden, or forest) and water habitats (such as ponds, streams, or lakes), showing a diverse range of living things in each.
The student can accurately depict observations of various plants and animals within each habitat, whether from firsthand experience or media sources, showing careful attention to realistic details.
The student not only compares different types of living things present in each habitat through their drawings but also highlights key differences clearly and accurately.
The student organizes their drawing to effectively demonstrate patterns of plant and animal diversity across different habitats, showing a clear understanding of habitat diversity.
CANNOT: The student might sometimes omit minor details or leave some elements unlabeled, but these omissions are rare and do not significantly impact the overall accuracy or completeness of the drawing.
